document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Belciana Walker, 1862 with description of three new species (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Pantheinae) from East and South East Asia. Revision of Pantheinae, contribution XII

subSubSection.paragraph:

, List of the Specimens of Lepidopterous Insects in the Collection of the British Museum 15 : 1671 . Holotype : male, Borneo, Sarawak (NHM).

Distribution and bionomics. Malaysia ( Cameron Highland, Negeri-Perak), Sri Lanka , Philippines (Isl. Luzon); Borneo ( Sarawak , Sabah), Indonesia (Sumatra, Java). The species occurs in primary and secondary lowland and montane forest at elevation 1000–1500 m in January, February, May, June, August, September, October, November, December. The known foodplans are
Shorea maximi
( Dipterocarpaceae ),
Heritiera
( Sterculiaceae ) (
Holloway 2009
).
